e595ae98-6fdd-4e3c-8d55-d9d8887180f9.description: Today’s innovators and entrepreneurs have a unique opportunity to tackle the climate crisis by creating business sustainability initiatives. In this cutting-edge programme, you will learn the foundation of climate science and explore recent climate innovation case studies, so that you can develop the actionable skills and strategic frameworks to create a carbon-neutral world, drive business value – and future-proof your career.
e595ae98-6fdd-4e3c-8d55-d9d8887180f9.name: Climate Innovation: Accelerating to Net Zero Emissions

issuer.summary: issued by Imperial College Business School Executive Education

entity.name: Imperial College Business School Executive Education

alignments.name: IACET
alignments.description: IACET is recognized internationally as a standard development organization and accrediting body that promotes quality of continuing education and training. Many companies, regulatory boards and organisations have been reported to accept the IACET CEU credit. Successful completion of this programme with a score of 70% or higher earns you 5.3 CEUs.

alignments.name: CPD
alignments.description: The CPD Certification Service is the leading independent CPD accreditation institution operating across industry sectors to complement the Continuing Professional Development policies of professional institutes and academic bodies. Completers of this programme may report 53 CPD hours.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Climate Innovation: Accelerating to Net Zero Emissions programme.

832f34a4-cf37-46c8-9d92-44ea550e2d65.description: This six-week online programme is designed to help startup founders, CEOs and heads of corporate new venture groups overcome the barriers of accessing expertise, networks, time and methodologies to create a new artificial intelligence (AI) startup, or to transform an existing venture. The programme covers how to identify business opportunities, leverage the dimensions of AI technologies, and build on the success of existing AI applications to improve products and services in any industry.
832f34a4-cf37-46c8-9d92-44ea550e2d65.name: Building Your AI Unicorn: Fast-Track Your Tech Startup
